channel.title: How do i change hometeleport add/change globalobjects on pi
channel.description: i got this problem: first i need to change home teleport from lumbridge to edge and i want to add soem globalobjects ...but in globalobject.cfg are only 1 object and if i add somethin it doesnt works! pls help out

item.title: How do i change hometeleport add/change globalobjects on pi

allright thanks for helping got all what i need now

item.title: How do i change hometeleport add/change globalobjects on pi
item.dc:creator: @kid2kewl2bereal kid2kewl2bereal
item.description:
@kid2kewl2bereal wrote:

if, by home teleport, you mean the actual magic teleport, then you need to;

go to clickingbuttons.java and search your home x cord, and then you should see your y cord next to it, seperated by a comma.
Change both x and y cords to the cords you want, and then search your y/x cord again to make sure nothing else is set to those x/y cords, and if their is, just change them, too.

^^I’m not 100% sure this will work, so make a backup just incase. But it should, I never changed my home yet.

Read full topic
item.source: How do i change hometeleport add/change globalobjects on pi

item.title: How do i change hometeleport add/change globalobjects on pi
item.dc:creator: @pj3r_b4rr4q3 pj3r b4rr4q3
item.description:
@pj3r_b4rr4q3 wrote:

thanks, for the fast help but how i change home-teleport

::right::

Go to: …Server\src\server. then open up the “Config.java” look for these lines:
Code:
public static final int START_LOCATION_X = 3087; // start here
public static final int START_LOCATION_Y = 3500;
public static final int RESPAWN_X = 3087; // when dead respawn here
public static final int RESPAWN_Y = 3500;Then just change those numbers to the home. If you want the Respawn location to be different, then change it, or do the same with the start. Start = when player first joins. Respawn = After player dies.
I usually have the start set to my tutorial or whatever you wanna call it lol.

Read full topic
item.source: How do i change hometeleport add/change globalobjects on pi

item.title: How do i change hometeleport add/change globalobjects on pi
item.dc:creator: @kid2kewl2bereal kid2kewl2bereal
item.description:
@kid2kewl2bereal wrote:

To add objects is not the same as Delta in a PI. Similar, but different.
Go to src-server-world-objectmanager.java

Search for: public void loadCustomSpawns(Client c)
You will see: c.getPA().checkObjectSpawn(-1, 2661, 3666, 1, 10);

Format: c.getPA().checkObjectSpawn(ObjID, X-Cord, Y-Cord, Rotation(I thiinnk), (don’t know));

EDIT:

Also, start location is (usually) located in the config.java.
Search “START” and you should see something like START_LOCATION_X = XXXX

By the way, their is a website called “google” you can use for these kinds of questions. That’s how I found your answers, sir:)

Read full topic
